title: Megan Moroney To Release Fan-Favorite Song â€œNo Caller IDâ€ This Month | Whiskey Riff
text: Finallyâ€¦ [Megan Moroney](http://whiskeyriff.com/tag/meg-moroney) confirmed that she has a new single dropping this month, one sheâ€™s been teasing out on the road for quite a while now called [â€œNo Caller ID.â€](https://www.whiskeyriff.com/2023/12/22/megan-moroney-teases-another-new-song-no-caller-id/) The breakup song has a really unique concept, which finds Megâ€™s ex finding new ways to contact her, though through the verses in the song, she eventually realizes sheâ€™s moved on enough and doesnâ€™t want to pick up the call with â€œno caller IDâ€ anymore. She shared a teaser of the studio cut over on TikTok earlier, and I think itâ€™s such a great song that I canâ€™t wait to hear in its entirety, in the form it will likely be included in on the next record. A fan in the comments asked her if sheâ€™d â€œrelease soon,â€ and Meg replied: â€œHow about this month?â€ We donâ€™t have an exact date quite yet, but seeing as weâ€™re already almost one week into January, I donâ€™t think weâ€™ll have to wait too much longer: Check it out: [@megmoroney]ft the waterbugs ğŸ˜ [#nocallerID] [â™¬ original sound â€“ Megan Moroney] Meg also perviously noted that sheâ€™s [â€œalmost doneâ€](https://www.whiskeyriff.com/2023/12/18/megan-moroney-teases-heartbreaker-called-28th-of-june-says-shes-almost-done-writing-next-album/) writing her second album, and teased another unreleased song a few weeks back called â€œ28th of Juneâ€ that is equally as beautiful, and I hope to get to hear on her sophomore project: Today, the Georgia native released a perfect cover of Chris Stapletonâ€™s supremely underrated deep cut [â€œWhat Are You Listening To?â€](https://www.whiskeyriff.com/2024/01/05/megan-moroney-releases-perfect-studio-cover-of-chris-stapletons-what-are-you-listening-to/)
